title: [和理非全面升級] 打工仔Email自動回覆

replies.msg:
岩岩收到某同事既Auto reply message, 提醒左我一件事
麻煩大家有返工定係罷工既，都去set返自己既Out-of-office / Auto-reply

我明白大家可能罷唔到工，唔好屌D仲返緊工既兄弟住，我地要用盡所有渠道去抗爭，勿以事小而不為！

Dear all,

It's not a secret what's happening to our home, Hong Kong.  These recurring violent suppression aiming at nullifying our opinions, terrorising us from the freedom of mind, speech and action are devastating.  We consider these terrorist acts are absolutely harmful, both physiologically and psychologically, to the people who are living in this city of free mind and free will.

Since 9th of June, many of us have been fighting a multiple sided war, professionally at work and morally as a citizen.  Regardless of what political opinion you have, things have gone even worse for all of us in recent weeks.

Please accept our apology for not being able to perform at the highest standard and availability, and I do not see how everyone will be working with their 100% until this puppet government answers citizens requests.

I am still reachable at my cell phone for really urgent matter.  For non-urgent matters, please deprioritise them for your own good and focus on the one task that is really important.

Best,
